q_a.a: Hover over "Stats" for how they work. What stats are important depend on what actions you need that uses them.
Short runs are better, for the early game and current balance. But as your runs get longer and you accrue talent and soulstones, longer runs become more useful.

q_a.q: What should my first goal be?
q_a.a: Finish the Crystal quest for mana, then do any other ones.

time_controls.restart_text: Resets the loop. Not a hard reset.

stories.story: Wrong place and wrong time. You were visiting the city next to yours, looking for work, when monsters attacked! Wolves, trolls, ogres, even a chimera destroyed the town while you were hiding under cover. When your cover was destroyed by a stray fireball from the defenders, you ran out in the open - just in time for a platinum adventurer to conjure an elemental, accidentally right underneath you. You blacked out, and when you came to, the monsters were all defeated, and cleanup was underway. You helped for a bit, but then you suddenly collapsed - painlessly, thankfully - and the world went dark. You woke up, and you were back where you were, minutes ago! You were looping in time! Desperately, you tried to run, but in about the same time, it happened again. A few more loops, and you accidentally ran into a vase with water in it - and then the loop lasted just a little longer. After some experimentation, it seems that your mana is your clock, and when it runs out - time resets. Hopefully there's enough mana around you to get enough time to do something meaningful. For now, you need to search for more mana water, and figure out how to use it better.

When bonus is on, you get 4 extra seconds per second (5x faster).

tooltip.explanation:
Actions' mana costs are both how much mana they take, as well as time. Stats reduce the time/cost that each takes. Actions' mana costs are reduced by (stat levels)^.8 %
Every time you run the action, it gives stat exp equal its mana cost, spread across its given stat ratios.
The mana cost reduction from stats does not affect the amount of stat exp the action gives - only talent and soulstones affect the total exp an action gives.
1% of exp gained for the stat goes to talent. As talent levels up, it affects stat gain exp equal to Talent Mult.

Talent multiplies xp gain by (talentLevel / 50 + 1) ^ 0.4
Soulstones multiply xp gain by 1 + soulstones ^ .6 / 10
Total Mult is a combination of your talent and soulstone bonuses.

e.g. An action costs 800 mana and has a breakdown of
Con
20%
Per
80%.
This effectively means 160 of the mana is controlled by
Con
, and the remaining 640 by
Per
.
If your
Per
is level 20 when the action is started, the bonus would be (1.20)^.8=1.157 so it'd be 640 / 1.157 = 553.15
Adding back the 160 from
Con
, the total mana the action takes (rounded up) is now 713, so ~89% of the original mana cost.

manasense.label: Mana Sense
manasense.desc: To control mana, first you need to know how to feel it around you. Useful for finding where things are.

manacontrol.label: Mana Control
manacontrol.desc: Control the mana to affect the world in mystical ways. Useful for both mana coming in or going out.

weapons.label: Weapons
weapons.desc: Your ability to use weapons for fighting one on one, or long range.

dark_ritual.label: Dark Ritual
dark_ritual.desc: The witch appreciates your dedication to the dark arts. +1% to Dark Magic exp gain from the Dark Magic action (rounded down) per ritual.
dark_ritual.desc2:
Actions are 10% faster in Beginnersville per ritual from 1-20.
Actions are 5% faster in the Forest Path per ritual from 21-40.
Actions are 2.5% faster in Merchanton per ritual from 41-60.

tooltip.no_reset_on_restart:
Buffs last through resets.
You can click on the right hand number to edit it and adjust the cap for that buff. (buff actions will automatically fail and not spend soulstones past your set cap)

town0.name: Startington
town0.desc: Recently shattered by a monster wave, it's got tons of things to fix.

town1.name: Deep Well
town1.desc: You felt something big in here. It's time to find it.

tooltip.desc:
Mana cost is based on ratio of stat %s.
Gained exp is proportional too.
Stat/Talent exp is gained every tick.
Skill exp is gained upon action completion unless otherwise specified.
Actions will target unchecked objects before known lootable objects.
tooltip.mana_used_explanation:
Shows stat gain affecting speed.
Updates every completed action.
Accurate at end of run.
tooltip.add_action_top: Add action to top of list
tooltip.higher_done_percent_benefic: You can find more stuff with higher %.
tooltip.list_explanation:
Drag and drop the actions to re-arrange them.
The next list becomes the current list every restart.
One second = 100 mana.
Minimum 1 tick per action.
Restarts automatically upon no actions left.

sense_potions.label: Sense Potions
sense_potions.tooltip: You need mana immediately, to keep going. You're not proud of this, but you'll be searching through mana potions that the town's defenders... left behind. Straining your ability to sense mana starts to pay off... permanently. Becomes 100% more effective for each mana sense level.
sense_potions.story_1: 50% Checked:⮀ You've found all of the easy potions. You can tell there are some under rubble, but your Mana Sense skill has to be a bit higher to find them.
sense_potions.story_2: 100% Checked:⮀ You've checked everywhere, and all of the available potions in town are known to you.

drink_potion.label: Drink Potion
drink_potion.tooltip: Some of them have mana left, sometimes the mana sense is pinging off of a different potion. No choice but to drink it to figure it out. Each good potion gives
drink_potion.tooltip2: mana. Every 2 potions are good. You can choose to drink the good ones first with "lootable first" checked.

dive_into_well.label: Dive Into Well
dive_into_well.tooltip:
While searching for mana potions, you felt something much bigger, although further away. After searching all around town, you've found the strongest source - down the well. You don't have much time, so you dive in to figure out what's down there.
Unlocked when Mana Sense is at least 2.
dive_into_well.story_1: Dove in:⮀ The water is cold, and you have to find a way out. After swimming for a bit, you find an access point and start to swim up, reaching a cave dimly lit by glowing crystals. Crystals that have mana in them. You know what to do next.

get_well_mana.label: Get Well Mana
get_well_mana.tooltip: Now you know where the mana source is, so you can go right to it and absorb it. There's a problem, however - you'll need a ladder to go back to the source from that direction. Cost reduces by 50 for each Mana Control level past 10, down to a cost of 1000. Gives 4000 mana. You of course can't both do this and go into the well to get it again.
get_well_mana.story_1: Source Absorbed:⮀ Using the ladder, you easily go to the mana source in the well and absorb it.

sense_crystals.label: Sense Crystals
sense_crystals.tooltip: You can feel mana crystals around you. They're in rubble and dirt piles, shaken loose from the battles that were fought above. Becomes 100% more effective for each mana sense level.
sense_crystals.story_1: 50% Checked:⮀ You've found most of the mana crystals.
sense_crystals.story_2: 100% Checked:⮀ You've checked everywhere, and all of the available crystals in the well are known to you.

uncover_crystal.label: Uncover Crystal
uncover_crystal.tooltip: Luckily, there is an shovel nearby. You work to remove the covering dirt, and reveal crystals with fresh mana in them. Each good crystal gives
uncover_crystal.tooltip2: mana. Every Mana Control level increases mana a crystal gives by 10, until it gives 800. Every 2 crystals are good. You can choose to drink the good ones first with "lootable first" checked.
uncover_crystal.story_1: 5 Crystals with mana:⮀ You're steadily improving the mana you can get from these crystals, but you've taken from all that have mana.
uncover_crystal.story_2: Mana Control 20:⮀ Every bit of mana from the crystals is pulled out when you try.

explore_tunnels.label: Explore Tunnels
explore_tunnels.tooltip: There's lots of branching paths. Time to look through all of them! You'll find more mana crystals on the way. This action is required to move on. Unlocks at 100% Mana Crystals Sensed. Becomes 100% more effective for each mana sense level.
explore_tunnels.story_1: 50% Checked:⮀ You've run into a lot of dead ends and collapsed tunnels. The further you get, the older this place seems - and the more dangerous.
explore_tunnels.story_2: 80% Checked:⮀ There's been a few grooves in the walls or floors you've seen - traps are ahead. So far, all of them have been triggered already.
explore_tunnels.story_3: 100% Checked:⮀ This is as far as you can go before you can see active traps in front of you. You've explored everywhere without them. From now on, you only need a short jaunt through the tunnels to collect the mana, and you'll reach these traps.

discover_traps.label: Discover Traps
discover_traps.tooltip: Look for traps in the tunnels before you move on. Figure out how to avoid them or disarm them. Requires Explore Tunnels before you can run this action. Unlocks at 100% Explore Tunnels. Becomes 100% more effective for each mana sense level.
discover_traps.story_1: 100% Checked:⮀ After nearly being killed many times, there's only one trap room that matters, and beyond it you can see more branching paths, as well as feel a stronger presence of mana. If you can just get rid of these traps... Maybe these switches will help?

switch1.label: Switch 1
switch1.tooltip: While searching around for traps, you find a switch in the wall. You flip it, but nothing seems to happen. Maybe there are other switches to find.
switch1.story_1: Switch flipped:⮀ Nothing obvious happens - maybe you need more switches?

switch2.label: Switch 2
switch2.tooltip: Another switch, in the floor this time. Switching it, or both the first and this one, result in nothing happening. You keep searching
switch2.story_1: Switch flipped:⮀ Nothing obvious happens - maybe you need more switches?

switch3.label: Switch 3
switch3.tooltip: A third switch, disguised as a candle holder! Flipping all 3 switches, you can hear a clink in the walls - Maybe you can get in and remove the trap mechanism now.
switch3.story_1: Switch flipped:⮀ Nothing obvious happens - maybe you need more switches?

disarm_traps.label: Disarm Traps
disarm_traps.tooltip: With all the switches flipped, you can disable the whole mechanism.
disarm_traps.story_1: Traps Disarmed:⮀ Pulling a final lever, you hear a clink, a shutter, and something grinds to a halt. You're reasonably certain it's finally safe to continue.

explore_deep.label: Explore Deep
explore_deep.tooltip: Past the traps, you find an even older area, more cavelike than the construction of before. There are mana veins here, filled with uesful mana. Still, they don't feel like the last piece you've been sensing all along. Becomes 100% more effective for each mana sense level.

absorb_vein.label: Absorb Vein
absorb_vein.tooltip: Requires you to disarm the traps to get to these veins. Each vein gives
absorb_vein.tooltip2: mana. Every Mana Control level past 10 increases mana a vein gives by 25, until it gives 2000. Every vein is full of mana.
absorb_vein.story_1: 5 veins with mana:⮀ The veins thankfully keep you going, and give you the time needed for the trial ahead.

get_to_source.label: Get To Source
get_to_source.tooltip: You've explored the area, and only one path remains - the one to the source. It's long, but the reward will be worth it.

absorb_source.label: Absorb Source
absorb_source.tooltip: The motherlode. The mana is deep and still, yet blinding in its quantity. It will take a lot of control to get it out. Cost reduces by 50 for each Mana Control level past 10, down to a cost of 800. Gives 4000 mana.
absorb_source.story_1: Source Absorbed:⮀ After a mighty struggle, the power fills you. Finally, you have time to do more now. First, however, is figuring out how to get out quickly.

escape_routes.label: Escape Routes
escape_routes.tooltip: With the light of the motherlode fading, you can see more tunnels ahead. Some are leading up - maybe you'll find a way out? Requires Absorb Source to be completed.
escape_routes.story_1: 100% Checked:⮀ You found it - a way out. You nearly cry in relief. Unfortunately, it's pretty high up.

escape_well.label: Escape Well
escape_well.tooltip: It's finally time to leave this well. The way out was down a cliff before you finally saw a small light in the ceiling, and after piling up some rocks to get to handholds, you're out. Run this action once to unlock new ones.
escape_well.story_1: Escaped:⮀ You climb and shimmy out, and then there's a wood floor above you, partially cracked. You open it a little more and find a house in ruins, but with the quantity of bottles around, you can see it as the alchemist's shop, or at least it was. Now that you know where you are, you could get back down much easier. That is, if you had the time to both do that and absorb the motherlode. You spot a bookshelf with most of the books destroyed, but an Introduction to Magical Healing book is intact.
